title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 132.16 - Rentals and gains from the sale or exchange of real property
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 132.16 - Rentals and gains from the sale or exchange of real property

State Regulations

Income from, and deductions connected with, the rental
of real property, and gain and loss from the sale, exchange or other
disposition of real property, are not subject to allocation under section
132.13
or
132.15
of this Part, but are considered as entirely derived from or connected with the
situs of such real property. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
132.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
